segments.cn: 所以这些圣诞传统，正如我们所说，它们通常是美国的，但许多其他文化也有类似的传统。

segments.en: That's correct.
segments.cn: 这是正确的。

segments.en: So obviously, traditions are different in every family.
segments.cn: 显然，每个家庭的传统都不同。

segments.en: Not everyone celebrates Christmas morning.
segments.cn: 并不是每个人都在圣诞早晨庆祝。

segments.en: Some people celebrate Christmas Eve, but most people will be familiar with Christmas stockings, Christmas trees, and Santa who comes down the chimney.
segments.cn: 有些人在平安夜庆祝，但大多数人会熟悉圣诞袜、圣诞树和从烟囱下来的圣诞老人。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So it also depends, I guess, on the culture and religion.
segments.cn: 所以这也取决于文化和宗教。

segments.en: Some religions celebrate Christmas differently or not at all.
segments.cn: 一些宗教以不同的方式庆祝圣诞节，或者根本不庆祝。

segments.en: So it's actually a very interesting time of the year.
segments.cn: 所以这实际上是一年中非常有趣的时刻。

segments.en: But if you look or if you can see any American movies, like I remember this one called The Santa Claus, it's very, you can see the typical American Christmas, you know, snow and trees and presents and Santa Claus, a lot of things.
segments.cn: 但是如果你看，或者如果你能看到任何美国电影，比如我记得有部叫《圣诞老人》的电影，你可以看到典型的美国圣诞节，知道的，雪、树、礼物和圣诞老人，还有很多东西。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So a good way to end this would be to say have a very Merry Christmas.
segments.cn: 所以结束这段话的好方法是说祝你圣诞快乐。

segments.en: That means, you know, have a nice holiday.
segments.cn: 这意味着，知道的，祝你假期愉快。

segments.en: Enjoy Christmas.
segments.cn: 享受圣诞节。

segments.en: If you're not going to celebrate Christmas for whatever reason, you can just say Happy Holidays.
segments.cn: 如果你因为任何原因不庆祝圣诞节，你可以说节日快乐。

segments.en: Happy Holidays.
segments.cn: 节日快乐。
